ComicInfo.Summary:
With The Dark Lord his prisoner, Dare orders the Starslayer ships to return to their home world. The Dark Lord escapes, however, and orders them to board.
Frank rebels against his incarceration at the Nuclear Facility, and, threatening to shoot himself, makes a break for it.
During an Apollo mission in 1987 astronaut Jack Keller is captured by an alien who takes his form and leaves to join the Apollo crew with the intention of surveying the Earth. Keller does not believe the alien can pass himself off, until he meets a fellow captive - Neil Armstrong.
Dredd falls into an ambush when he pursues Carmody into the Oxygen Desert.
Savage and his crew make it to Liverpool, and then out to sea with Prince John, but don't realise they have a traitor in their midst. Rosa captures Nessie.
Pearly, one of the Heroes' new cheer-leaders, seems to be a traitor as she zaps Giant with a beam of invisible energy during a game.
